"use client" import { ScrollArea } from '@/components/ui/scroll-area'; import { Sidebar, SidebarContent, SidebarGroup, SidebarGroupContent, SidebarGroupLabel, SidebarHeader, SidebarMenu, SidebarMenuBadge, SidebarMenuButton, SidebarMenuItem, SidebarProvider, SidebarTrigger } from '@/components/ui/sidebar' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const menuConfig = [ { label: "Dashboards", items: [ { icon: "solar:atom-line-duotone", label: "Dashboard 1", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:chart-line-duotone", label: "Dashboard 2", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:screencast-2-line-duotone", label: "Dashboard 3", href: "#" }, ], }, { label: "Frontend Pages", items: [ { icon: "solar:home-smile-line-duotone", label: "Homepage", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:info-circle-line-duotone", label: "About Us", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:document-line-duotone", label: "Blog", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:notebook-square-line-duotone", label: "Blog Details", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:mailbox-line-duotone", label: "Contact Us", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:gallery-minimalistic-line-duotone", label: "Portfolio", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:dollar-minimalistic-line-duotone", label: "Pricing", href: "#" }, ], }, { label: "Landing page", items: [ { icon: "solar:bill-list-line-duotone", label: "Landingpage", href: "#" } ], }, { label: "Apps", items: [ { icon: "solar:star-circle-linear", label: "AI", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:phone-line-duotone", label: "Contacts", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:cart-3-line-duotone", label: "Ecommerce", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:widget-add-line-duotone", label: "Blogs", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:chat-round-line-line-duotone", label: "Chats", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:shield-user-outline", label: "User Profile", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:bill-check-outline", label: "Invoice", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:document-text-outline", label: "Notes", href: "#" }, ], }, { label: "Pages", items: [ { icon: "solar:settings-minimalistic-line-duotone", label: "Account Setting", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:question-circle-line-duotone", label: "FAQ", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:dollar-minimalistic-linear", label: "Pricing", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:accessibility-broken", label: "Roll Base Access", href: "#" }, { icon: "solar:home-add-linear", label: "Integrations", href: "#" }, ], }, ]; const Page = () => { const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = useState("Dashboard 1") return (
{menuConfig.map((group, groupIndex) => ( {group.label && ( {group.label} )} {group.items.map((item: any, itemIndex) => ( setActiveItem(item.label)} > {item.label} {item.badge && ( {item.badge} )} ))} ))}
{Array.from({ length: 10 }).map((_, index) => (
))}
) } export default Page
